sentences.sentence: Many are staying in gymnasiums and community centers.
sentences.translation: 许多人还住在体育馆和社区中心。

sentences.sentence: However, they all belong to the single-function gymnasiums.
sentences.translation: 不过，这些都属于单项功能的场馆。

sentences.sentence: It is one of the indispensable fitting instruments in gymnasiums and at home.
sentences.translation: 是健身房和家庭中不可或缺的健身器械之一。
